info.name: Dark/Night Choice of Games
info.description:
A dark/night theme for Choice of Games.

Feel free to tell me any suggestions, or let me know about any issues.

Enjoy!
info.additionalInfo: This theme is for all the games and the main website, but not forums. Here's an Adfly link to Google you can click if you're feeling nice. Thanks! Changelog: 24/02/2017 + Fixed choice hover colour. + Fixed choice border colour. 14/03/2015 + First version.
